sentiment_articles.title: Walmart stock tanks 8% after it warns 2025 won't be as gangbusters as 2024
sentiment_articles.summary: Despite reporting strong results for its latest fiscal year, Walmart’s (WMT) stock sank in early trading on Thursday after the retailer issued conservative guidance for its upcoming year.Read more...
